desc: Little Rebel is a boutique coffee roaster that specialises in unique blends for the discerning coffee palate. We are specialty coffee roasters and are passionate about getting the most flavour and elegance from our coffee beans. We make a point of sourcing our beans that are grown and farmed ethically.

layout.text: Little Rebel is a boutique coffee roaster that specialises in unique blends for the discerning coffee palate.
